purpose.summary: The IMSFUNCS copybook defines a group of constants under 01 FUNC-CODES for IMS DL/I function codes such as 'GU  ', 'GHU ', 'GN  ', 'GHN ', 'GNP ', 'GHNP', 'REPL', 'ISRT', and 'DLET'. It also defines PARMCOUNT as a fixed value of +4, likely for the number of parameters in IMS PCB calls. These constants standardize IMS database operation calls in COBOL programs.
purpose.business_context: IMS DL/I database navigation, insertion, deletion, and replacement operations in mainframe COBOL applications

business_rules.description: FUNC-CODES provides standardized 4-character IMS DL/I function codes (GU, GHU, GN, GHN, GNP, GHNP, REPL, ISRT, DLET)
business_rules.logic_summary: Defined as PIC X(04) VALUE literals under 01 FUNC-CODES group item

business_rules.description: PARMCOUNT is fixed at +4 for IMS PCB calls
business_rules.logic_summary: Defined as PIC S9(05) VALUE +4 COMP-5 under 01 FUNC-CODES
